projects.name: The Unique Bean
projects.desc: Developed a rudamentary UI for a coffee shop. It utilizes React and Redux. I used React to its full extent create an efficient and responsive UI, used Redux for stable state management - particularly as a form of local storage. I also Implemented features like product filter and, cart management.

Leveraging Reactâ€™s features, I created a seamless user experience, and with meticulous attention to detail in CSS, I crafted a visually appealing user interface that adapts flawlessly across devices and browsers, enhancing user engagement.

projects.name: Headphones & Earbuds
projects.desc: I built a sleek frontend for a headphones store using HTML5, SCSS, and JavaScript. I designed a user-friendly interface with interactive cards for easy item management. Plus, I added a dark and light mode option to suit different user preferences and enhance the browsing experience.
